aom.scripting.ui

Class HorizontalScrollBar

  • Object
    • HorizontalScrollBar

  • public class HorizontalScrollBar
extends Object
    Represents a Horizontal Scrollbar.
    Author:
    Mythic_Freak - mythic.freak[a]gmail.com

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      String background
      The background image of this Scrollbar.
      String sliderAreaArt
      The background image of the area the slider moves in.
      boolean sliderButtons
      Sets whether or not the up/down arrows should be added to both ends of the slider.
      String sliderLeftBtnSet
      The image used for the left button.
      String sliderPipArt
      The image used for the slider itself.
      String sliderPipTextureCoords
      Defines what part of the slider image should be used.
      String sliderRightBtnSet
      The image used for the right button.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Field Detail

      • background

        public String background
        The background image of this Scrollbar. Transparent if no image is provided.
        Example
        "ui background yellow opaque"

      • sliderAreaArt

        public String sliderAreaArt
        The background image of the area the slider moves in. Plain white if no image is provided.
        Example
        "ui background dark blue opaque"

      • sliderButtons

        public boolean sliderButtons
        Sets whether or not the up/down arrows should be added to both ends of the slider.

      • sliderLeftBtnSet

        public String sliderLeftBtnSet
        The image used for the left button.
        Example
        "sliderLeftBtn"

      • sliderPipArt

        public String sliderPipArt
        The image used for the slider itself.
        Example
        "ui slider pip horizontal"

      • sliderPipTextureCoords

        public String sliderPipTextureCoords
        Defines what part of the slider image should be used.
        Example
        "0 0 1 1"

      • sliderRightBtnSet

        public String sliderRightBtnSet
        The image used for the right button.
        Example
        "sliderRightBtn"

    • Constructor Detail
